ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Added Z-Wave "Send to sleep" option to "Query on Wake Up" program - Added SendToSleep command after each WakeUp query for battery powered device - Added custom serial port path selector for various serial interfaces (z-wave, x10, w800rf, insteon) - Updated FibaroRGBW app - Fixed ZWaveLib packet fragmentation issue (affecting RaZberry) and timeout errors occurring with some devices (eg. Fibaro in wall switches) - Fixed "event stream disconnected" issue occurring on some mono-arm platforms - Removed 20 seconds pause after backup restore/factory reset - Fix modules serialization bug (backslash character not escaped)
